channel.title: Need help with compiler please
channel.description:
can someone please help me with my compiler ? im not sure whats wrong but its says that it con not find the right path. i have jdk1.6.0_02.
i have set my compiler to this path..
@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
what have i done wrong ? or what is wrong ?
im in need of urgent help please. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 04:32:28 PM[/size][hr]i just noticed that the jdk in this message below is different..
@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
i changed it but still not working :(
please help[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 05:10:58 PM[/size][hr]i also tried this @echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.pause

pause
